name: html-css-project-emihle-troos
description: You will create a personal portfolio website using HTML and CSS in this project. The website should showcase your skills, projects, and any other relevant information you wish to include. You will apply your knowledge of HTML to structure the content of your website effectively and use CSS to style and layout the elements. The project will allow you to demonstrate your understanding of HTML5 semantic elements, CSS selectors, the CSS box model, and responsive design principles.
